full_threads.body:
Hi Jaqui, 

Just confirming that we’ve updated the text and added it to the current MoveWell page. It’s now ready for your review.

You can view it here: https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell/

Please let us know if you’d like any further changes.

Hi

Can you please change it to say "Click Here for Term payment (for current MoveWell participants)"

And please now add it to the current MoveWell page.

Many thanks

Jaqui

Hi Jaqui, 

Confirming we have now moved it and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell-2

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Quick note: If you have a new concern or an additional task related to a previous ticket, please send it through in a new email. This helps us keep things clear and respond more efficiently.

Hi Allie

Can you move the button to be underneath the red casual classes button

Thanks

Hi Jaqui, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell-2

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Quick note: If you have a new concern or an additional task related to a previous ticket, please send it through in a new email. This helps us keep things clear and respond more efficiently.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Allie Borcena
Workflow **T1 tickets assigned to Rika** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hi Wolf


On the MoveWell page, can you create an additional button (underneath the casual classes button) with the code in the email below that says "Click Here for Term payment". Please make this button a different colour (perhaps green or yellow).


https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell/


Please do this on the test page and send to us to check


Thank you
Jaqui


From: Cody Kane <CodyKane@wolper.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 10:07 AM
To: Jaqui Herman <JaquiHerman@wolper.com.au>
Subject: Fw: TAM Hours







Get Outlook for iOS

From: Jade Gardiner <Jade.Gardiner@mindbodyonline.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 14, 2025 5:07 pm
To: Cody Kane <CodyKane@wolper.com.au>
Cc: Tina Sinclair <TinaSinclair@wolper.com.au>
Subject: RE: TAM Hours


Hi Cody,

Confirming this is a buy now link! Please see screenshots below. You might want to make sure you have completely removed the schedule code and clear your cache before testing this. Keep me updated with how you are getting on and if I can try jump on a call with you to go through this.

Additionally, you can retrieve this code from branded web manager at this address and cross check the code: https://brandedweb.mindbodyonline.com/users/sign_in



My best,

Jade Gardiner (she/her)

Technical Account Manager

©2024 MINDBODY, Inc. All rights reserved.

Privacy Policy


From: Cody Kane <CodyKane@wolper.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 13 June 2025 3:01 PM
To: Jade Gardiner <Jade.Gardiner@mindbodyonline.com>
Cc: Tina Sinclair <TinaSinclair@wolper.com.au>
Subject: RE: TAM Hours


CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization.

Hi Jade,

Can I confirm the below code is for the buy now link?
<script src=https://widgets.mindbodyonline.com/javascripts/healcode.js type="text/javascript"></script><healcode-widget data-version="0.2" data-link-class="healcode-pricing-option-text-link" data-site-id="59640" data-mb-site-id="164448" data-service-id="11380" data-bw-identity-site="false" data-type="pricing-link" data-inner-html="Buy Now" />

When we put it on the test website it comes up with the schedule?

Regards,


Cody

Cody Kane

Physiotherapy and Day Services Manager

Wolper Jewish Hospital

8 Trelawney Street

Woollahra NSW 2025

Email: codykane@wolper.com.au

Phone: 83242284

Wolper Jewish Hospital supports the right to disconnect. If this email is received outside of working hours, please feel no obligation to respond until you are back at work.

From: Jade Gardiner <Jade.Gardiner@mindbodyonline.com>
Sent: Wednesday, 11 June 2025 7:43 AM
To: Cody Kane <CodyKane@wolper.com.au>
Cc: Tina Sinclair <TinaSinclair@wolper.com.au>
Subject: RE: TAM Hours


Hi Cody,

Brilliant! Glad I could assist there. Feel free to send my email to your website people directly if need be as well 😊

How is everything else running? Would you like to schedule a call next week to review any campaigns, new approaches for campaigns and smart lists or any reports/stats you wanted to go through?

I remember a while back Tina had asked to go through some specific reporting however we never got the chance to connect.

My best,

Jade Gardiner (she/her)

Technical Account Manager

©2024 MINDBODY, Inc. All rights reserved.

Privacy Policy


From: Cody Kane <CodyKane@wolper.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, 10 June 2025 8:41 PM
To: Jade Gardiner <Jade.Gardiner@mindbodyonline.com>
Cc: Tina Sinclair <TinaSinclair@wolper.com.au>
Subject: RE: TAM Hours


CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization.

Hi Jade,

That is correct re your assumption.

I will send this to our website people and give it a go.

Regards,

Cody

Cody Kane

Physiotherapy and Day Services Manager

Wolper Jewish Hospital

8 Trelawney Street

Woollahra NSW 2025

Email: codykane@wolper.com.au

Phone: 83242284

Wolper Jewish Hospital supports the right to disconnect. If this email is received outside of working hours, please feel no obligation to respond until you are back at work.

From: Jade Gardiner <Jade.Gardiner@mindbodyonline.com>
Sent: Tuesday, 10 June 2025 8:30 PM
To: Cody Kane <CodyKane@wolper.com.au>
Cc: Tina Sinclair <TinaSinclair@wolper.com.au>
Subject: RE: TAM Hours


Hi Cody,

I have a few questions with the email and request you sent through. With the casual classes, we wanted to provide the schedule so that clients can choose what day they want to book. But understanding that full term clients (i.e. clients who purchase 12 sessions) will not be required to book as you enrol them.

If the above is correct, we would need to add a buy now link to this. Currently this CTA (call to action is linked to a schedule widget). The buy now link will act as a purchasing window only and will not prompt clients to use it and book in. They will also be forced to log in as you mentioned to make the purchase. Can I confirm this is what you desire for this?

If the above is true, you will have a schedule widget for casual users and a buy now link for 12 sessions, and this 12 session buy now link code is below:
<script src=https://widgets.mindbodyonline.com/javascripts/healcode.js type="text/javascript"></script><healcode-widget data-version="0.2" data-link-class="healcode-pricing-option-text-link" data-site-id="59640" data-mb-site-id="164448" data-service-id="11380" data-bw-identity-site="false" data-type="pricing-link" data-inner-html="Buy Now" />

I cannot add this code into your website for you, but you should be able to place this in the CTA 😊

If I have misunderstood any of the above, or can assist further - let me know!!!

My best,

Jade Gardiner (she/her)

Technical Account Manager

©2024 MINDBODY, Inc. All rights reserved.

Privacy Policy


From: Cody Kane <CodyKane@wolper.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 6 June 2025 10:20 AM
To: Jade Gardiner <Jade.Gardiner@mindbodyonline.com>
Cc: Tina Sinclair <TinaSinclair@wolper.com.au>
Subject: RE: TAM Hours


CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization.

Hi Jade,

Apologies for the delayed reply, there has been some changes here which have consumed our time.

I've been very happy with the service you have provided thus far and where we have come to.

I'd be happy to keep the 2 hours for June but then am away all of July and will likely have no input at that time.

Are we able to jump in at different times for TAM hours or is this a continuous agreement?

We are working on the buy now link for the 12 sessions and I attach below our test website.

Could you please add a new link to our test page at https://wolper.com.au/services/movewell-exercise-program-v2/

The password is movewell

I thought the buy now link for 12 sessions would take participants to the login page so they would login and then head to the checkout screen as we have done all the enrolling.

However, as you will see it rolls to a schedule screen which we do not want as we are assessing everybody first.

Could you have a look and provide some feedback on why this may be occurring and how we can modify it?

Regards,

Cody

Cody Kane

Physiotherapy and Day Services Manager

Wolper Jewish Hospital

8 Trelawney Street

Woollahra NSW 2025

Email: codykane@wolper.com.au

Phone: 83242284

Wolper Jewish Hospital supports the right to disconnect. If this email is received outside of working hours, please feel no obligation to respond until you are back at work.

From: Jade Gardiner <Jade.Gardiner@mindbodyonline.com>
Sent: Wednesday, 21 May 2025 8:00 AM
To: Cody Kane <CodyKane@wolper.com.au>
Cc: Tina Sinclair <TinaSinclair@wolper.com.au>
Subject: TAM Hours


Hi Cody and Tina,

I hope you are both well and having a great start to your week. Firstly, I wanted to check in if we wanted to schedule a call in this week, or Monday next week to catch up and discuss anything that might be top of mind.

Additionally, I wanted to discuss our TAM hours moving forward. We first connected January and discussed completing a thorough audit document, system optimisation, streamlining a booking and payment process for Wolper Jewish Hospital movement classes, restrictions surrounding these classes and bookings and the possibility of contracts. With consideration to some limitations surrounding our perfect world workflow for your clients, through various workarounds and problem solving strategies, I believe we have found a workflow that both alleviates some admin work on your end and achieves some of your booking goals for you clients. Ad hoc tech support has also been provided throughout, which I do hope has allowed you to feel supported and confident using the software.

I'd like to suggest that we shift our focus toward exploring how we can better utilise the Marketing Suite to help you feel more confident with this feature, while also providing greater value to the Movement sector at Wolper Jewish Hospital. Additionally, we can review reporting tools to identify opportunities for re-engaging clients who haven't visited in a while and encouraging more frequent visits.

Finally, reviewing our frequency of ad hoc support you have needed and the progress we've made so far, I'd recommend adjusting your TAM hours from 4 to 2 hours per month going forward. However, this is completely up to you and a business - either way I am here to continue to support you and find the best value you can through the software.

Please let me know your availability to chat and/or let me know your thoughts on the above 😊. Looking forward to continuing our work together!!

My best,

Jade Gardiner (she/her)

Technical Account Manager

©2024 MINDBODY, Inc. All rights reserved.
